nodes.body: ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by Ruben-VandeVelde.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8955798404/job/24596906075)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8955798404/job/24596905981)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/8955798404/job/24596906041)
I tried; it wasn't quite straightforward. (Be my guest to also try - or we can postpone this.)

I just tried again: the `rw`s still fire, but using `get_permutation'Aux` means the last `simp` doesn't close the goal.

The goal before the `simp` changes from
`nthLe (permutations'Aux x s) (length s) â‹¯ = nthLe (permutations'Aux x t) (length s) â‹¯`
to
`get (permutations'Aux x s) { val := length s, isLt := â‹¯ } = get (permutations'Aux x t) { val := length s, isLt := â‹¯ }`;
the ... terms are the same, but I don't know why this makes a difference.
It's because the index references the length of the list in its type, so you can't "swap out" the list while leaving the index there. Anyway, I just pushed a fix.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Data/List/Perm): some nthLe -> get migration

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Data/List): remove some long-deprecated theorems
